sentences.en: ...the outside of the building.
sentences.cn: …该建筑物的外部。

sentences.en: a village 20 miles outside of New York.
sentences.cn: 纽约城外20英里的村庄。

sentences.en: As he said it, there was a hammering outside.
sentences.cn: 他说这话时，外面传来一阵敲打声。

sentences.en: every minute, or at the outside, every ninety seconds.
sentences.cn: 每分钟，或最多每90秒。

sentences.en: Go and play outside.
sentences.cn: 到外面去玩。

sentences.en: He insisted we stop at a small restaurant just outside of Atlanta.
sentences.cn: 他坚持让我们在亚特兰大市外不远的一家小餐馆歇歇脚。

sentences.en: I started puttering around outside, not knowing what I was doing.
sentences.cn: 我开始在外面闲荡，不知道自己在做什么。

sentences.en: I stepped outside and pulled up my collar against the cold mist.
sentences.cn: 我走出门，竖起衣领抵御冷雾。

sentences.en: It’s outside my experience, I’m afraid.
sentences.cn: 恐怕我没有这方面的经验。

sentences.en: Legislation to that effect created fierce controversy both in Parliament and outside.
sentences.cn: 那类立法在议会内外都引起了激烈的争论。

sentences.en: Mahler was also known for his passionate involvements outside marriage.
sentences.cn: 马勒也因为其轰轰烈烈的婚外情而出名。

sentences.en: More cash will be saved by shutting studios and selling outside-broadcast vehicles.
sentences.cn: 通过关闭演播室和出售实况转播车将节省更多资金。

sentences.en: My heart was hammering. The footsteps had stopped outside my door.
sentences.cn: 我的心怦怦直跳。脚步声已停在我的门外。

sentences.en: Outside each door a guard sprang to attention as they approached.
sentences.cn: 当他们走近时，每扇门外都有一名卫兵肃身立正。

sentences.en: Outside observers said the election was free and fair.
sentences.cn: 外部观察员说此次选举自由而公正。

sentences.en: Outside, Bruce glanced at his watch: "Dear me, nearly oneo'clock."
sentences.cn: 出了门，布鲁斯瞥了一眼自己的手表，“天哪，快一点了。”

sentences.en: She could hear a clamour in the road outside.
sentences.cn: 她能听得见外面路上的吵闹声。

sentences.en: The house will need a lot of outside repairs before we can sell it.
sentences.cn: 房子的外部需要好好修一修，之后我们才能把它卖出去。

sentences.en: The outside air was heavy and moist and sultry.
sentences.cn: 外面的空气沉滞、潮湿而闷热。

sentences.en: The outside of the house was painted white.
sentences.cn: 这房子的外墙刷成了白色。

sentences.en: The President's unescorted vehicle was ambushed just outside the capital.
sentences.cn: 刚出首都，总统无人护卫的汽车就遭到了伏击。

sentences.en: The victim was outside a shop when he was attacked.
sentences.cn: 被害人遇袭时正在一家商店的外面。

sentences.en: There was a scream of brakes from the carriageway outside.
sentences.cn: 外面车行道上传来刺耳的刹车声。

sentences.en: We turned off the outside lights and went to bed.
sentences.cn: 我们关掉外头的电灯，上床睡觉了。

sentences.en: we'll get outside of a feed of bacon and egg.
sentences.cn: 我们要吃一顿咸肉和鸡蛋。

sentences.en: When we got up, it was still dark outside.
sentences.cn: 我们起床时，外面天还没亮。

sentences.en: You can park your car outside our house.
sentences.cn: 你可以把汽车停在我们家屋外。

words.tran_cn: 外面的,在外面的,表面上的

phrases.tran_cn: 从外侧向内侧的；从外缘向中心的

trans.tran_cn: 外部的，向外面的，不相关的，不可能的，快车道的

trans.tran_en: the part or surface of something that is furthest from the centre
beyond the limits or range of a situation, activity etc
on or to a place on the outside of sth
the part or surface of something that is furthest from the centre
